message_1:
A study was conducted to compare the average income of two different cities, City A and City B. The collected data for income in City A is { $45,000, $50,000, $55,000, $60,000, $65,000} and for City B is { $42,000, $48,000, $52,000, $58,000, $62,000}. 

Test whether there is a significant difference in the median income between City A and City B. Use the Wilcoxon rank-sum test at the significance level of 0.05.
